001package org.biopax.validator.api;
002
003
004import java.io.InputStream;
005import java.util.Collection;
006import java.util.Set;
007
008import org.biopax.validator.api.beans.Validation;
009
010/**
011 * Object model validator.
012 *
013 * @author rodche
014 */
015public interface Validator {
016
017  /**
018   * Gets all the active validation rules.
019   *
020   * @return available (loaded) validation rules
021   */
022  Set<Rule<?>> getRules();
023
024
025  /**
026   * Gets all the registered validation results (where error cases get stored).
027   *
028   * @return results
029   */
030  Collection<Validation> getResults();
031
032
033  /**
034   * Associates a validation report with the data and creates in-memory model.
035   *
036   * The validation result is object where all the problems
037   * related to this data instance are collected.
038   *
039   * @param validation validation result object
040   * @param inputStream data input stream
041   */
042  void importModel(Validation validation, InputStream inputStream);
043
044  /**
045   * Associates a model, element, or stream with the validation result.
046   *
047   * Some errors may occur during the data import and parsing before the model is created,
048   * e.g., in XML headers, software bugs. We want to report these problems as well.
049   *
050   * @param element object (e.g., existing Model)
051   * @param validation results object
052   */
053  void associate(Object element, Validation validation);
054
055
056  /**
057   * Associates, e.g., a property value with validation results
058   * by using the 'parent' element to find it. This allows for
059   * errors to be reported while model is being read,
060   * maybe before the child element is added to the model.
061   *
062   * @param parent model element
063   * @param child value
064   */
065  void indirectlyAssociate(Object parent, Object child);
066
067
068  /**
069   * Given the object, finds
070   * the corresponding validations
071   * (that it's been associated with).
072   *
073   * @param obj a model, element or even I/O handler
074   * @return validation results
075   */
076  Collection<Validation> findValidation(Object obj);
077
078
079  /**
080   * Post-model validation.
081   *
082   * The result also includes other
083   * problems that might occur during
084   * the model initialization and creation.
085   *
086   * @param validation results object
087   */
088  void validate(Validation validation);
089
090
091  /**
092   * Adds the validation error (with proper attributes)
093   * to registered validation objects associated with the object.
094   *
095   * @param obj object associated with a validation result (can be even stream, during import, but usually is a model element)
096   * @param errorCode error code
097   * @param reportedBy class name of a validation rule or a name of another validating class or method (AOP aspect method, jointpoint).
098   * @param isFixed if true, - find and set the attribute
099   * @param args additional message parameters (details)
100   */
101  void report(Object obj, String errorCode, String reportedBy, boolean isFixed, Object... args);
102
103}
